title: Zoo: Name a cockroach after you're ahead, and we'll feed it to a predator.
subtitle: Participants are reported to be able to see the same nutrition as reprisals in real time.
author: Madison Dapcevich
vclaim: As part of the annual fundraiser, the San Antonio Zoo in Texas offers despised lovers an opportunity to name a cockroach or a rodent after their predecessor before feeding him to a larger animal.
